title: I love some of the most hateful tweets. I think they're very funny. In the negative attacks on me, there are frequently some real displays of humor. author: Lawrence O'Donnell

title: I guess when you turn off the main road, you have to be prepared to see some funny houses.
author: Stephen King

title: When 'Toast' got on Netflix, I noticed a difference. It was something I thought that only myself and a few people would find funny, and suddenly it's on a very large platform. Now it kind of belongs to everyone.
author: Matt Berry

title: Do you want me to apologize after every joke? If it doesn't offend somebody it's probably not a joke. It's probably an observation that's not funny. It's gotta offend somebody somewhere.
author: Jeff Ross

title: Eyebrows are really important because they structure the face. In school it was funny because I was always the one walking around with tweezers plucking my girlfriends' eyebrows. I was really good; eyebrow tweezing runs in my family - my mother used to do mine, and I picked it up.
author: Rita Ora

title: Posturing is funny to me.
author: Casey Wilson

title: It's funny because I've made a living off of words, but words get in the way of what you really want to say.
author: Kanye West

title: It was funny being at high school and also grocery shopping and having a job. Other kids were going home to their parents, who were doing their laundry, and I was like, 'Wait, what?' I was super isolated. I was 16, alone in New York, and modelling.
author: Margaret Qualley

title: I went through a phase where I thought it was really funny to make pratfalls in very crowded places. I jumped out of a moving car once, for a laugh. That was a mistake.
author: Paul Rudd

title: It's funny, when you have a theme so particular to cows - or it could be anything like hair or nails - when you're rapping about a specific thing, you can have more punchlines about it.
author: Doja Cat

title: It's just my natural way - to be funny. I don't know why that is. But as I've said, humor is a quick cover for shock, horror, confusion. The critics hate funny writers for the most part. author: T. C. Boyle

title: Funny songs aren't usually that good. Like Weird Al and maybe a couple of Beatles songs, but it's kind of hard to bring humor into rock music in an interesting way.
author: Win Butler

title: It's so funny because if you tweet your lyrics and then you hear it in a song next week, you're like, 'Hey I had that same idea.' I'm very secretive with my music. We have to send emails password protected. Because once that song gets out, you aren't selling that thing.
author: Ester Dean

title: I'd love to become like Bill Murray, who was so funny on 'Saturday Night Live' and has gone on to do some of the landmark comedies people like. And then to add this whole other phase to his career with 'Lost in Translation' and 'Rushmore.' I always felt to be able to have something similar to that would be great.
author: Will Ferrell

title: In a funny way, nothing makes you feel more like a native of your own country than to live where nearly everyone is not.
author: Bill Bryson

title: I went swimming the other day and my wife was watching and she said, 'You know, it's funny, it's when you've got no clothes on, no one recognizes you.' I said, 'What are you saying? That I should do more love scenes?'
author: Eddie Marsan

title: It sounds funny, but I always try to keep an open mind about what I'm writing about. Sometimes I squeak my opinions in there, but generally I don't. I try to be objective about things that I'm writing about.
author: John Mellencamp

title: I don't want to sound hoity-toity, but people told me I should watch 'Cheers' because it's very funny. So I watched it, and I just went, 'This is the great show of the universe?' To me, acting is making characters believable, not just doing jokes.
author: Teri Garr

title: You know, I've always thought that it would be really funny if somebody made a romantic comedy where absolutely everything went well from beginning to end.
author: Fiona Apple

title: It's funny now how much we look at - whatever you want to call it: art, design, culture stuff, film - online, and how in the online world, you're instantly global.
author: Mike Mills

title: 'A Bug's Life' is a really funny movie and the characters have such different personalities. The movie is happy and then gets really sad and I'm like, W'hoa, I'm feeling this way and this movie is about bugs!'
author: Booboo Stewart

title: Whatever is funny is subversive, every joke is ultimately a custard pie... a dirty joke is a sort of mental rebellion.
author: George Orwell

title: I look at old performance videos now, and it's really funny - I thought I was such a gangster!
author: Becky G

title: I was the female lead in a romantic comedy. It's a little indie film that we shot in China called 'America Town,' starring Daniel Henney and Bill Paxton. author: Eliza Coupe

title: I think it's funny how excited people can get about things I say that don't have anything to do with music. I made a disparaging comment about McDonald's on Twitter once and people flipped out on me.
author: Ron Pope

title: I don't feel that I'm explaining the world or teaching people anything. And I'm not trying to be a mirror, showing them what's really going on the world. All I'm trying to do is think of stuff that's funny, just like when I'm kidding around with my friends.
author: Steven Wright

title: I thought I was funny as a kid.
author: Jo Brand

title: I thought 'Borat' was a breakthrough comedy, because it was really funny. It wasn't some studio-produced script with 14 writers.
author: Steve Martin

title: I play a female Indiana Jones, a professor who hunts down precious objects, like a bowl that belonged to the Buddha. They tailored the role to me: I wanted to be smart, funny, and to kick some ass.
author: Tia Carrere

title: Let's make some funny pictures.
author: Tex Avery

title: That is not all I need. I need dogs. A house filled with dogs and a smart, funny, kind, loving girlfriend or wife.
author: Moby

title: I hit Instagram and Twitter as soon as I wake up. And then I check my texts and emails. It's funny that I check social media before I check my email.
author: Guillermo Diaz

title: I'd done drag since I was 14, for special occasions, and in 2010 a friend of mine with her own burlesque group was looking for a host. author: Conchita Wurst

title: I'm doing the film 'Don't Stop Dreaming' with Rishi Kapoor and Suniel Shetty. They're both so funny and fantastic!
author: Laila Rouass

title: I was lucky. My family is wonderful. And it's funny, because most of my best friends come from very large families. So it always felt as if I had lots of siblings, though in the end I had to leave them and go home. I kind of got the best of both worlds as a kid.
author: Sophia Bush

title: I detest jokes - when somebody tells me one, I feel my IQ dropping; the brain cells start to disappear. author: Johnny Depp

title: It perhaps has a chance, a commercial chance, this film. It's funny, it's charming, the idea is original, it's unusual and it makes fun of the movie industry in a way that it needs to be poked fun at.
author: Mark Rydell

title: It's funny, in literature no one ever goes to the lavatory.
author: Tom Baker

title: It is not every day that a pop superstar gets involved with terrorism as a victim, so the press takes advantage of that to say things they think are funny.

title: If I find something funny or something that kind of cracks me up, I'll get up on stage. I don't care what situation I'm in or what media I'm in: I'm gonna say it.
author: Jo Koy

title: Children are the most honest critics. They will say 'You're funny', but also 'You're pathetic - go away.'
author: Dylan Moran

title: I found Leonora Carrington's 'The Hearing Trumpet' really funny.
author: Olga Tokarczuk

title: I'm the youngest in my family, and everyone is very funny, and I was always trying to keep up with them. I just loved making people laugh.
author: Lisa Kudrow

title: I was the kind nobody thought could make it. I had a funny Boston accent. I couldn't pronounce my R's. I wasn't a beauty.
author: Barbara Walters

title: It's so funny, actors usually have a directing ambition. I've got no ambition for directing.
author: Majandra Delfino

author: Lewis Black
